methods.name: modelSizeChanged
methods.comment: Called whenever the number of indexes changed

params.name: indexMapper
params.comment:
Maps indexes from before the model size change to indexes after
 the model size changed.

methods.name: dataChanged
methods.comment: Called when the data at an index or range of indexes changes.

params.name: start
params.comment: the starting index for the region of data changes.

params.name: end
params.comment: the ending index (inclusive) for the region of data changes.
